description: CSharp toolkit containing useful extensions and functions.
releaseNotes:
Bug Fixes:
1. Modified the Intersect() extension in the ObjectExtensions class
2. Identified a bug which might cause a NullRefereceException exception in the Comparer() extension in the CollectionExtensions class. The bug has been resolved.
3. The ToInt64() extension had a bug and was corrected.
      
New Additions:
1. Format - The following extension method is designed in order to format the string using the string.Format method provided by the .NET framework. This extension makes it easier and less of a hassle to use. Just use the dot notation and select Format and pass it the arguments needed.
2. IsURL - The following extension method is designed in order to check whether the url string value is a valid URL format.
3. ToXML - The following extension method is designed in order to serialized an object of type T into an XML formatted string.
4. FromXML - The following method is designed in order to deserialize a string XML representation into the appropriate object
title: Facous
